markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defy Fey](/Feats.aspx?ID=4054) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 129</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Greenwatch Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=4053)

</column>

---

You are keen to the wiles of the [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) and can usually shake off their magic. Whenever you fail, but don't critically fail, a save against a spell with a duration of at least 1 round cast by a fey creature, you can attempt a second save against the original DC at the start of your next turn to end any lingering effects the spell might have. This can end [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) caused by a spell but can't reverse any effects that have been resolved already (such as damage dealt when the spell was cast).

<title level="2">Defy Fey leads to...</title>
[Greenwatcher](/Feats.aspx?ID=4058)
name: Defy Fey
